MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: REM sleep behavior disorder screening questionnaire (RBDQ)

rbdsq_01.Description: I sometimes have very vivid dreams

rbdsq_02.Description: My dreams frequently have an aggressive or action-packed content

rbdsq_03.Description: The dream contents mostly match my nocturnal behaviour (e.g. if you run in the dream do your feet move in bed?)

rbdsq_04.Description: I know that my arms or legs move when I sleep

rbdsq_05.Description: It thereby happened that I (almost) hurt my bed partner or myself

rbdsq_06a.Description: During my dreams, I have or previously had: speaking, shouting, swearing, laughing loudly

rbdsq_06b.Description: During my dreams, I have or previously had: sudden limb movements, "fights"

rbdsq_06c.Description: During my dreams, I have or previously had: gestures, complex movements, that are useless during sleep, e.g., to wave, to salute, to frighten mosquitoes

rbdsq_06d.Description: During my dreams, I have or previously had: Things that fell down around the bed, e.g., bedside lamp, book, glasses?

rbdsq_07.Description: It happens that my movements awake me?

rbdsq_08.Description: After awakening I mostly remember the content of my dreams well

rbdsq_10.Description: I have/had a disease of the nervous system (e.g., stroke, head trauma, parkinsonism)

rbdsq_score_total.Description: Total RBDSQ Score: Sum of questions 1-10
